channel.title: Donator Help
channel.description: Hey guys...on my server when i make someone donater their character right are 4.. so they can spawn and do some other nice commands... can i fix the donator for character right 1...and mod 2 and admin 3 and owner 4...??

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

soulfear1234:

Alright did u have teamviewer?

Yes I have it, and no I’m not taking an hour to edit your client so the crown shows for is donor.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“soulfear1234, post:6, topic:472004”]But look character-rights = 4 (for the crown and commands)
isDonator = 1 (for the teleport and d zone tab)
but can i add only the crown with that isDonator = 1
so they wont be able to do commands they gonna be still character-rights = 0[/quote]
You’d have to do some massive client to server modifications, but yes, it’s possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

sk8rdude461:

changing all the rights (So that mod isn’t 1 anymore) will throw off your player icons in the client. You’ll have to modify them.

Yes, you’ll need to change which Crown corresponds to which Rank of course.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

soulfear1234:

Ok thanks but wich files i can fix the character right…? [PI] server??

What Team_Rocket (No offence mate) has regretted to inform you, is that with changing all the rights (So that mod isn’t 1 anymore) will throw off your player icons in the client. You’ll have to modify them.
Instead of doing that, you can set up a new command structure that breaks your Commands class into sections, where players of X rights can only use X rights.

To answer your current question, you can change it, well in Commands, and anywhere that has a right related check. The playerRights is inhibited from the client because of the icons, but in actuality, you can make them anything you want.
I could do this to my server if I ‘really’ wanted:
Mod: playerRights = 100;
Admin: playerRights = 24873;
Owner: playerRights = 48;
The issue would be the icons, that’s about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @soulfear1234 soulfear1234
item.description:

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Yes you can. You also might want to make Administrative Commands specific for Rights as well. To prevent your Donators from I.P. Banning everyone and such.

Read full topic
